# HUD::GET_MENU_TRIGGER_EVENT_DETAILS

## Summary
Passes the details of the trigger event - must only be called once, and only when HAS_MENU_TRIGGER_EVENT_OCCURRED returns true

## Parameters
* **FRONTEND_MENU_SCREEN\*** triggerId
* **INT\*** menu
